toneRules.description: Voice governance for all institutional communication
characteristics: No emotional adjectives (avoid: love, care deeply, empower, transform, unlock)
No marketing language or sales rhetoric

examples: Students learn Quranic science through structured daily instruction.
Teachers maintain 1:8 student ratios during boarding hours.
Morning begins at 5:30 AM with Fajr prayer and reflection.

directorMessage.name: Sheikhs Hassan Muhammad Mwaita
directorMessage.title: Institutional Director
directorMessage.message: This school operates on principle, not trend. We guide students toward intellectual rigor and moral foundation. Order and consistency protect growth.

contentRenderingRules.paragraphs: One idea per paragraph. Max 3 sentences.
contentRenderingRules.spacing: Generous white space. Separation of concerns.
contentRenderingRules.animation: None for authority content. Subtle transitions only for UI.
